scripts.sam:local: npm run build && sam local start-api --env-vars env.json --port 3001
scripts.sam:deployfirst: npm run sam:build && sam deploy --parameter-overrides "DynamoDBTableName=p1-serverless-web-app-dev-notes UserPoolId=ap-southeast-1_4AGbojAKh" --guided --profile terraform-dev
scripts.sam:deploy: npm run sam:build && sam deploy --profile terraform-dev
